overview: The King tosses Rosita in jail and when Don Diego, who Rosita loves, tries to defend her, he too is thrown in jail. While Don Diego is sentenced to be executed, the King lusts after Rosita and decides to put her up in a luxurious villa. To give her a title, he marries her to a masked nobleman, who turns out to be Don Diego.
tagline: GLORIOUS, VITAL, ALLURING WOMANHOOD; LITHE AND SINUOUS, CAPRICIOUS AND COQUETTISH, FLIRTING!
title: Rosita
